name: Pinball Portfolio
description:
This Pinball game is about learning how to build a computer.  The main objective is to collect computer parts that are laying around on the playing field.   Some parts give add to your multiplier allowing you to gain more points.  Each time you collect coins or hit bumpers you will also gain points.  To win the game you must collect every part shown in the parts list that is on the left side of your screen.


Developers: Henry Hollyday & Noah Page
Sound: Bella Flosi
